languages.text: "Леди Теодора {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}поступила бы{/d} именно так — доверила дознание верным слугам. Однако хорошей идеей было бы понаблюдать за ее работой — это может быть весьма познавательно".

"That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}поступила бы{/d} именно так — доверила дознание верным слугам. Однако хорошей идеей было бы понаблюдать за ее работой — это может быть весьма познавательно".

traits.locale_text: "That is exactly what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}. She would have entrusted this matter to her loyal subjects. However, I would still recommend observing the Master-at-Arms at work — it may prove insightful."

"That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

languages.text: «Eso es exactamente lo que {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}habría hecho{/d} lady Theodora: confiarle este asunto a sus leales sirvientes. Sin embargo, recomiendo que observe el trabajo de la maestra de armas, Lord Capitán; creo que puede ser instructivo».
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es exactamente lo que {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}habría hecho{/d} lady Theodora: confiarle este asunto a sus leales sirvientes. Sin embargo, recomiendo que observe el trabajo de la maestra de armas, Lord Capitán; creo que puede ser instructivo».

languages.text: 「忠実な下僕に問題を委ねる、それこそまさに、レディ・シオドーラが{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}なされたであろう{/d}ことです。とはいえ、マスター・アット・アームズがお仕事をしているところを見学されることをおすすめいたしますよ、ロード・キャプテン…有意義なものとなることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

traits.locale_text: 「忠実な下僕に問題を委ねる、それこそまさに、レディ・シオドーラが{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}なされたであろう{/d}ことです。とはいえ、マスター・アット・アームズがお仕事をしているところを見学されることをおすすめいたしますよ、ロード・キャプテン…有意義なものとなることでしょう」

languages.text: “如果西奥多拉夫人还在的话，她{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}确实会这么做{/d}，将这件事情交给她忠诚的仆人去办。不过，我还是建议您去观察一下戒律大师的工作过程，舰长大人，这说不定会对您有所启发。”
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

traits.locale_text: “如果西奥多拉夫人还在的话，她{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}确实会这么做{/d}，将这件事情交给她忠诚的仆人去办。不过，我还是建议您去观察一下戒律大师的工作过程，舰长大人，这说不定会对您有所启发。”

languages.text: "Genau das hätte Lady Theodora auch {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}getan{/d}: die Angelegenheit ihren treuen Dienern überlassen. Dennoch würde ich Euch raten, den Waffenmeister bei der Arbeit zu beobachten, Lord Captain – es könnte erhellend sein."
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

traits.locale_text: "Genau das hätte Lady Theodora auch {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}getan{/d}: die Angelegenheit ihren treuen Dienern überlassen. Dennoch würde ich Euch raten, den Waffenmeister bei der Arbeit zu beobachten, Lord Captain – es könnte erhellend sein."

languages.text: « C'est exactement ce qu'{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}aurait fait{/d} dame Théodora : elle aurait laissé ses fidèles serviteurs se charger de l'affaire. Je vous recommande néanmoins d'observer la capitaine d'armes à l'œuvre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce pourrait être instructif. »
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exactement ce qu'{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}aurait fait{/d} dame Théodora : elle aurait laissé ses fidèles serviteurs se charger de l'affaire. Je vous recommande néanmoins d'observer la capitaine d'armes à l'œuvre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce pourrait être instructif. »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora da tam olarak {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}böyle yapardı{/d}: Meseleyi sadık hizmetkârlarına emanet ederdi. Ancak yine de Silahtar'ın çalışmalarını gözlemlemenizi tavsiye ederim Lord Kaptan. Aydınlatıcı bir deneyim olabilir."
languages.original_text: "That is precisely what Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_OldWays}would have done{/d}: entrust the matter to her faithful servants. However, I would still advise you to observe the Master-at-Arms at work, Lord Captain — it may prove enlightening."
